name: get-terminals
description:
Returns the payment terminals that the API credential has access to and that match the query parameters. 
To make this request, your API credential must have the following [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management API â€” Terminal actions read

searchQuery.description: Returns terminals with an ID that contains the specified string. If present, other query parameters are ignored.

otpQuery.description: Returns one or more terminals associated with the one-time passwords specified in the request. If this query parameter is used, other query parameters are ignored.

countries.description: Returns terminals located in the countries specified by their [two-letter country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).

merchantIds.description: Returns terminals that belong to the merchant accounts specified by their unique merchant account ID.

storeIds.description: Returns terminals that are assigned to the [stores](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/ManagementService/latest/get/stores) specified by their unique store ID.

brandModels.description: Returns terminals of the [models](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/ManagementService/latest/get/companies/{companyId}/terminalModels) specified in the format *brand.model*.

pageNumber.description: The number of the page to fetch.

pageSize.description: The number of items to have on a page, maximum 100. The default is 20 items on a page.
